previewText: I bring you the unending light of Pelor—light that illuminates the darkness, comforts the weary and wounded, and vexes the black of heart.
benefit: Learn an extra language of your choice, add Religion to your class skill list, and gain a +2 bonus to Religion checks.
flavor: Your calling is to bring the light of your chosen faith to the dark corners of the world. What places have you seen in your journeys, and were they receptive, indifferent, or antagonistic to your message? How do you feel when you’re back in the temples of the faithful? What circumstances will cause you to leave the road and settle down?Good Background: Cleric.
name: Traveling Missionary
